about-me.title: About Me:
text: Born in Cuiabá-MT and living in Campo Grande-MS since childhood, I have always been curious about technology. I was the famous nerd who fixed computers for uncles, aunts, friends, and so on.

My first interaction with a computer was a Windows 98 that wasn't even connected to the internet, which was still dial-up at the time. This was my uncle's computer, which was practically a family heirloom, the result of bartering and other things. Nobody knew why we had a computer at home, not even me, but it fascinated me.
